title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 401.1 - Notification by the department of transportation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 401.1 - Notification by the department of transportation

State Regulations

The Department of Transportation shall notify the
administrator within 24 hours after the inception of cleanup and removal
operations in response to a discharge of petroleum. An estimate shall be
provided to the administrator concerning the cost of the operation
necessitating such notification. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 2

401.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
